leads.lead_text: Largest leaves no more than 15 mm wide; hairs minute, (c. 0.1 mm long) ± restricted to young growth and branches of inflorescence
Larger leaves 2 cm wide or more; hairs c. 0.5 mm long, abundant on all but older growth
